thread.title: Emory shooting threat, Yik Yak reacts
thread.title_full: Emory shooting threat, Yik Yak reacts | www.ajc.com

author: Erica Hernandez
title: Emory shooting threat, Yik Yak reacts
text:
A student was arrested Sunday evening after threatening to carry out a mass shooting on Emory's Oxford campus in Newton County. The threat was initially posted to the social media app, Yik Yak, which allows users to post short messages and photos anonymously for other users to either upvote (like) or down vote (dislike). Since the threat was posted and later removed, students at the Oxford campus have posted updates detailing their frustration and fear in the hours and days following. Read through a sampling of Oxford's Yik Yak feed below.
A student was arrested Sunday evening after threatening a mass shooting on Emory Universityâ€™s Oxford campus in Newton County, according to school officials and media reports.
